airtable_add_comment_to_record.description: Adds a comment to an existing record.

props.name: text
props.description: The content of the comment. To mention a user, use the format `@[userId]` or `@[userEmail]`.

props.name: parentCommentId
props.description: Optional. The ID of a parent comment to create a threaded reply.

airtable_create_base.description: Create a new base with a specified table structure.

props.name: name
props.description: The name for the new base.

props.name: tables
props.description: Define the tables for the new base. Use the default value as a template. The first field for each table will be its primary field.

airtable_create_record.description: Adds a record into an airtable

airtable_create_table.description: Create a new table in an existing base.

props.name: name
props.description: The name for the new table.

props.name: description
props.description: An optional description for the new table.

props.name: fields
props.description: A JSON array of fields for the new table. The first field in the array will become the primary field.

airtable_find_base.description: Find a base by its name or a keyword.

props.name: baseName
props.description: The name or keyword to search for within your base names.

airtable_get_record_by_id.description: Retrieve a single record from a table by its unique ID.

airtable_find_table_by_id.description: Get a table's details and schema using its ID.

airtable_find_table.description: Find a table in a given base by its name.

props.name: tableName
props.description: The exact name of the table you want to find.

airtable_get_base_schema.description: Retrieve the schema for a specific base, including all its tables and fields.

airtable_upload_file_to_column.description: Uploads a file to attachment type column.

props.name: recordId
props.description: The ID of the record to which you want to upload the file.

props.name: file
props.description: The file to be uploaded, which can be provided either as a public file URL or in Base64 encoded format.

props.name: file_content_type
props.description: Specifies the MIME type of the file being uploaded (e.g., 'image/png', 'application/pdf').

props.name: filename
props.description: The name of the file as it should appear after upload.
